nodes.text: Gatheri was a male Human captain in the military forces of House Thul on the planet Alderaan during the Alderaan Civil War. He was stationed at the Thul estate, distributing armor to Thul and Imperial forces.

Gatheri appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Heavy Armor Vendor for Imperial players on Alderaan. With the release of Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015, Gatheri was removed from the game along with the rest of the Heavy ARmor Vendors. His position is also marked on a map in Star Wars: The Old Republic Explorer's Guide, a game guide released by Prima Games.
